function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of conspiracy theories related to 5G and COVID-19","Impact":"Causing misinformation and public fear, potentially leading to non-compliance with pandemic control measures","Mitigation":"Educational campaigns to debunk conspiracy theories, and promoting credible sources of information","Technologies":"Data analysis and social media monitoring tools","People":"Public, scholars, and communities","Owner":"Government health agencies, educational institutions, and media outlets"},{"Description":"Neglect of 5G's business and social value in pandemic prevention and control research","Impact":"Limiting the understanding of 5G's potential contribution to pandemic control beyond technical aspects","Mitigation":"Incorporating business and social impact analysis in 5G research, and promoting interdisciplinary collaboration","Technologies":"Data analytics, interdisciplinary research methods","People":"Researchers, policy makers, and business leaders","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, and industry organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of focus on digital materiality's impact on innovation in dynamic environments","Impact":"Inability to leverage the potential of digital technologies for innovation in pandemic prevention and control","Mitigation":"Conducting research on the adaptive capabilities of digital materiality and its role in enabling innovation, and integrating dynamic environment considerations into technology design","Technologies":"Research on digital materiality, adaptive technology design","People":"Technology researchers, innovators, and policymakers","Owner":"Technology research institutions, innovation labs, and industry stakeholders"}]}
